pli-tv-pvr19:26.2: _Dukkaṭā katā_ would seem to be plural, but according to the sub-commentary, it should be read as singular. [Sp-ṭ.3.475](): _Dukkaṭā katāti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ_, “_Dukkaṭā katā_: an offense of wrong conduct is said.”
pli-tv-pvr19:45.4: According to the commentary, the instrumental _adhikaraṇena_ should be read as an accusative. [Sp.5.476](): _Pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇena cāti adhikaraṇañca pañcannamevāti attho_.
pli-tv-pvr19:47.2: Again, it seems the instrumental, _vūpasamena_, should be read as an accusative. [Sp.5.476](): _Pañcannaṃ vūpasamena cāti etesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma hotīti attho_.
